requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 或更高
  • Processor: 1.7GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForece GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 或更高
  • Processor: 3.4GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForece GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
